name: Le Schmilblick
storyline: Un jeu de quiz inspiré de l'ancienne émission télé du même nom.
summary: The legendary Schmilblick guessing game is back. Have fun guessing the mystery objects: animals, cities, vegetables, sports, movies, TV series ... there is something for everyone. Close to the riddles of "what am I?" or the "who am I?", the universal principle is to guess what lies behind an image or its clues.
